sections.title: Valuation and Exit Strategy
sections.body: DCF, multiples, and market comps with sensitivity simulations; analysis of performance, profitability, cash flow, risks, and value-uplift opportunities; tailored exit path (full/partial sale, strategic partner, merger) with financing options.
